name: Game Station IDLE
description: This is an internet cafe management game. The game is an arcade idle type game. Customers who come to the cafe in the game come to sit in the area they want, if the area they want is empty, they sit down. Each computer has a certain time. Expired customers drop the money and leave. The player unlocks new features with the money they receive. New places are opened according to the satisfaction of incoming customers. Computers can crash randomly. Computer repair is also one of our duties. Another duty is to control our employees who play games instead of working.
